headline: 1 Dividend Growth Stock Down 35% to Buy Right Now.
summary: Hershey (NYSE: HSY) isn't normally viewed as a high-yield stock, but its dividend yield of 3.2% today is near its highest level ever.  Investors can still easily find higher yields on Wall Street.  Here's what's going on and why you might want to buy Hershey right now.
